   20: 
   21: -module(bs_match_cover_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %% Limiting error locations to lines makes it more likely that unsafe
   24: %% reordering of clauses will be noticed.
   25: -compile([nowarn_shadow_vars, {error_location,line}]).
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   29: 	 init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   30:          verify_highest_opcode/1, expand_and_squeeze/1,
   31: 	 size_shadow/1,int_float/1,otp_5269/1,null_fields/1,wiger/1,
   32: 	 bin_tail/1,save_restore/1,
   33: 	 partitioned_bs_match/1,function_clause/1,
   34: 	 unit/1,shared_sub_bins/1,bin_and_float/1,
   35: 	 dec_subidentifiers/1,skip_optional_tag/1,decode_integer/1,
   36: 	 wfbm/1,degenerated_match/1,bs_sum/1,coverage/1,
   37: 	 multiple_uses/1,zero_label/1,followed_by_catch/1,
   38: 	 matching_meets_construction/1,simon/1,matching_and_andalso/1,
   39: 	 otp_7188/1,otp_7233/1,otp_7240/1,otp_7498/1,
   40: 	 match_string/1,zero_width/1,bad_size/1,haystack/1,
   41: 	 cover_beam_bool/1,matched_out_size/1,follow_fail_branch/1,
   42: 	 no_partition/1,calling_a_binary/1,binary_in_map/1,
   43: 	 match_string_opt/1,select_on_integer/1,
   44: 	 map_and_binary/1,unsafe_branch_caching/1,
   45: 	 bad_literals/1,good_literals/1,constant_propagation/1,
   46: 	 parse_xml/1,get_payload/1,escape/1,num_slots_different/1,
   47:          beam_bsm/1,guard/1,is_ascii/1,non_opt_eq/1,
   48:          expression_before_match/1,erl_689/1,restore_on_call/1,
   49:          restore_after_catch/1,matches_on_parameter/1,big_positions/1,
   50:          matching_meets_apply/1,bs_start_match2_defs/1,
   51:          exceptions_after_match_failure/1,
   52:          bad_phi_paths/1,many_clauses/1,
   53:          combine_empty_segments/1,hangs_forever/1,
   54:          bs_saved_position_units/1,empty_matches/1,
   55:          trim_bs_start_match_resume/1,
   56:          gh_6410/1,bs_match/1,
   57:          binary_aliases/1,gh_6923/1,
   58:          bs_test_tail/1]).
   59: 
   60: -export([coverage_id/1,coverage_external_ignore/2]).
   61: 
   62: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   63: -include_lib("syntax_tools/include/merl.hrl").
   64: 
   65: 
   66: suite() ->
   67:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   68:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   69: 
   70: all() -> 
   71:     [{group,p}].
   72: 
   73: groups() -> 
   74:     [{p,test_lib:parallel(),
   75:       [verify_highest_opcode,
   76:        size_shadow,int_float,otp_5269,null_fields,wiger,
   77:        bin_tail,save_restore,expand_and_squeeze,
   78:        partitioned_bs_match,function_clause,unit,
   79:        shared_sub_bins,bin_and_float,dec_subidentifiers,
   80:        skip_optional_tag,decode_integer,wfbm,degenerated_match,bs_sum,
   81:        coverage,multiple_uses,zero_label,followed_by_catch,
   82:        matching_meets_construction,simon,
   83:        matching_and_andalso,otp_7188,otp_7233,otp_7240,
   84:        otp_7498,match_string,zero_width,bad_size,haystack,
   85:        cover_beam_bool,matched_out_size,follow_fail_branch,
   86:        no_partition,calling_a_binary,binary_in_map,
   87:        match_string_opt,select_on_integer,
   88:        map_and_binary,unsafe_branch_caching,
   89:        bad_literals,good_literals,constant_propagation,parse_xml,
   90:        get_payload,escape,num_slots_different,
   91:        beam_bsm,guard,is_ascii,non_opt_eq,
   92:        expression_before_match,erl_689,restore_on_call,
   93:        matches_on_parameter,big_positions,
   94:        matching_meets_apply,bs_start_match2_defs,
   95:        exceptions_after_match_failure,bad_phi_paths,
   96:        many_clauses,combine_empty_segments,hangs_forever,
   97:        bs_saved_position_units,empty_matches,
   98:        trim_bs_start_match_resume,
   99:        gh_6410,bs_match,binary_aliases,
  100:        gh_6923,
  101:        bs_test_tail]}].
  102: 
  103: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  104:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
  105:     Config.
  106: 
  107: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  108:     ok.
  109: 
  110: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  111:     Config.
  112: 
  113: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  114:     Config.
  115: 
  116: 
  117: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
  118:     Config.
  119: 
  120: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
  121:     ok.
  122: 
  123: verify_highest_opcode(_Config) ->
  124:     case ?MODULE of
  125:         bs_match_r25_SUITE ->
  126:             {ok,Beam} = file:read_file(code:which(?MODULE)),
  127:             case test_lib:highest_opcode(Beam) of
  128:                 Highest when Highest =< 180 ->
  129:                     ok;
  130:                 TooHigh ->
  131:                     ct:fail({too_high_opcode_for_21,TooHigh})
  132:             end,
  133: 
  134:             %% Cover min/max for OTP 25.
  135:             10 = max(0, min(10, id(42))),
  136:             ok;
  137:         _ ->
  138:             ok
  139:     end.
  140: 
  141: size_shadow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  142:     %% Originally OTP-5270.
  143:     7 = size_shadow_1(),
  144:     7 = size_shadow_2(8),
  145:     7 = size_shadow_3(),
  146:     no = size_shadow_4(8),
  147:     Any = {any,term,goes},
  148:     {2577,Any,-175,whatever} =
  149: 	(size_shadow_5(Any, 12))(<<2577:12>>, -175, whatever),
  150:     {7777,Any,42,whatever} =
  151: 	(size_shadow_6(Any, 13))(42, <<7777:13>>, whatever),
  152:     {<<45>>,<<>>} = size_shadow_7({int,1}, <<1:16,45>>),
  153:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
  154: 	(catch size_shadow_7({int,42}, <<1:16,45>>)),
  155:     ok.
  156: 
  157: size_shadow_1() ->
  158:     L = 8,
  159:     Fs = [fun(<<L:L,B:L>>) -> B end,
  160:           fun(A) ->
  161:                   (fun([<<L:L,B:L>>]) -> B end)([A])
  162:           end,
  163:           fun(A) ->
  164:                   (fun([<<L:L,B:L>>,<<L:L,B:L>>]) -> B end)([A,A])
  165:           end,
  166:           fun(A) ->
  167:                   <<Size:L,_/bits>> = A,
  168:                   Inner = fun([L], {#{key1 := <<L:L,B:L>>,
  169:                                     key2 := <<L:L,B:L>>}, L}) -> B end,
  170:                   Inner([Size], {#{key1 => A,key2 => A},Size})
  171:           end],
  172:     size_shadow_apply(Fs, <<16:8, 7:16>>).
  173: 
  174: size_shadow_2(L) ->
  175:     Fs = [fun(<<L:L,B:L>>) -> B end,
  176:           fun(A) ->
  177:                   (fun([<<L:L,B:L>>]) -> B end)([A])
  178:           end,
  179:           fun(A) ->
  180:                   (fun({<<L:L,B:L>>,<<L:L,B:L>>}) -> B end)({A,A})
  181:           end],
  182:     size_shadow_apply(Fs, <<16:8, 7:16>>).
  183: 
  184: size_shadow_3() ->
  185:     L = 8,
  186:     Fs = [fun(<<L:L,B:L,L:L>>) -> B end,
  187:           fun(A) ->
  188:                   (fun({tag,[<<L:L,B:L,L:L>>]}) -> B end)({tag,[A]})
  189:           end,
  190:           fun(A) ->
  191:                   (fun({tag,<<L:L,B:L,L:L>>,<<L:L,B:L,L:L>>}) -> B end)({tag,A,A})
  192:           end],
  193:     size_shadow_apply(Fs, <<16:8, 7:16,16:16>>).
  194: 
  195: size_shadow_4(L) ->
  196:     Fs = [fun(<<L:L,B:L,L:L>>) -> B;
  197:              (_) -> no
  198:           end,
  199:           fun(A) ->
  200:                   Inner = fun([<<L:L,B:L,L:L>>]) -> B;
  201:                              (_) -> no
  202:                           end,
  203:                   Inner([A])
  204:           end,
  205:           fun(A) ->
  206:                   Inner = fun({<<L:L,B:L,L:L>>,<<L:L,B:L,L:L>>}) -> B;
  207:                              (_) -> no
  208:                           end,
  209:                   Inner({A,A})
  210:           end],
  211:     size_shadow_apply(Fs, <<16:8, 7:16,15:16>>).
  212: 
  213: size_shadow_5(X, Y) ->
  214:     fun (<< A:Y >>, Y, B) -> fum(A, X, Y, B) end.
  215: 
  216: size_shadow_6(X, Y) ->
  217:     fun (Y, << A:Y >>, B) -> fum(A, X, Y, B) end.
  218: 
  219: fum(A, B, C, D) ->
  220:     {A,B,C,D}.
  221: 
  222: size_shadow_7({int,N}, <<N:16,B:N/binary,T/binary>>) ->
  223:     {B,T}.
  224: 
  225: size_shadow_apply([F|Fs], Arg) when is_function(F, 1) ->
  226:     size_shadow_apply(Fs, Arg, F(Arg)).
  227: 
  228: size_shadow_apply([F|Fs], Arg, Res) when is_function(F, 1) ->
  229:     Res = F(Arg),
  230:     size_shadow_apply(Fs, Arg, Res);
  231: size_shadow_apply([], _, Res) ->
  232:     Res.
  233: 
  234: int_float(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  235:     %% OTP-5323
  236:     <<103133.0:64/float>> = <<103133:64/float>>,
  237:     <<103133:64/float>> = <<103133:64/float>>,
  238: 
  239:     %% Must work with type and flags in either order.
  240:     NativeFortyTwo = id(<<42/native-float>>),
  241:     <<42/float-native>> = NativeFortyTwo,
  242:     <<42/native-float>> = NativeFortyTwo,
  243: 
  244:     %% Must work with redundant flags.
  245:     SixtyFour = id(<<64/float>>),
  246:     <<64/unsigned-float>> = SixtyFour,
  247:     <<64/float-unsigned>> = SixtyFour,
  248: 
  249:     %% Coverage of error cases in sys_pre_expand:coerce_to_float/2.
  250:     case id(default) of
  251: 	<<(1 bsl 1024):64/float>> ->
  252: 	    ct:fail(should_not_match);
  253: 	default ->
  254: 	    ok
  255:     end.
  256: 
  257: %% Stolen from erl_eval_SUITE and modified.
  258: %% OTP-5269. Bugs in the bit syntax.
  259: otp_5269(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     check(fun() -> L = 8,
  261: 		   F = fun(<<A:L,B:A>>) -> B end,
  262: 		   F(<<16:8, 7:16>>)
  263:                 end,
  264:                 7),
  265:     check(fun() -> L = 8, <<A:L,B:A>> = <<16:8, 7:16>>, B end,
  266: 	  7),
  267:     check(fun() -> U = 8, (fun(<<U:U>>) -> U end)(<<32:8>>) end,
  268: 	  32),
  269:     check(fun() -> U = 8, [U || <<U:U>> <- [<<32:8>>]] end,
  270: 	  [32]),
  271:     check(fun() -> [X || <<A:8,
  272: 			   B:A>> <- [<<16:8,19:16>>],
  273: 			 <<X:8>> <- [<<B:8>>]] end,
  274: 	  [19]),
  275:     check(fun() -> A = 4, B = 28, bit_size(<<13:(A+(X=B))>>), X end,
  276: 	  28),
  277:     check(fun() ->
  278: 		  <<Size,B:Size/binary,Rest/binary>> = <<2,"AB","CD">>,
  279: 		  {Size,B,Rest}
  280: 	  end,
  281: 	  {2,<<"AB">>,<<"CD">>}),
  282:     check(fun() -> X = 32,
  283: 		   [X || <<X:X>> <- [<<1:32>>,<<2:32>>,<<3:8>>]] end,
  284:     %% "binsize variable"    ^
  285: 	  [1,2]),
  286:     check(fun() ->
  287: 		  (fun (<<A:1/binary, B:8/integer, _C:B/binary>>) ->
  288: 			   case A of
  289: 			       B -> wrong;
  290: 			       _ -> ok
  291: 			   end
  292: 		   end)(<<1,2,3,4>>) end,
  293: 	  ok),
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: null_fields(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  297:     check(fun() ->
  298: 		  W = id(0),
  299: 		  F = fun(<<_:W>>) -> tail;
  300: 			 (<<>>) -> empty
  301: 		      end,
  302: 		  F(<<>>)
  303: 	  end, tail),
  304:     check(fun() ->
  305: 		  F = fun(<<_/binary>>) -> tail;
  306: 			 (<<>>) -> empty
  307: 		      end,
  308: 		  F(<<>>)
  309: 	  end, tail),
  310:     ok.
  311: 
  312: wiger(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  313:     ok1 = wcheck(<<3>>),
  314:     ok2 = wcheck(<<1,2,3>>),
  315:     ok3 = wcheck(<<4>>),
  316:     {error,<<1,2,3,4>>} = wcheck(<<1,2,3,4>>),
  317:     {error,<<>>} = wcheck(<<>>),
  318:     ok.
  319: 
  320: wcheck(<<A>>) when A==3->
  321:     ok1;
  322: wcheck(<<_,_:2/binary>>) ->
  323:     ok2;
  324: wcheck(<<_>>) ->
  325:     ok3;
  326: wcheck(Other) ->
  327:     {error,Other}.
  328: 
  329: bin_tail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  330:     S = <<"abcde">>,
  331:     $a = bin_tail_c(S, 0),
  332:     $c = bin_tail_c(S, 2),
  333:     $e = bin_tail_c(S, 4),
  334:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch bin_tail_c(S, 5)),
  335:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch bin_tail_c_var(S, 5)),
  336: 
  337:     $a = bin_tail_d(S, 0),
  338:     $b = bin_tail_d(S, 8),
  339:     $d = bin_tail_d(S, 3*8),
  340:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch bin_tail_d_dead(S, 1)),
  341:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch bin_tail_d_dead(S, 9)),
  342:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch bin_tail_d_dead(S, 5*8)),
  343:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch bin_tail_d_var(S, 1)),
  344: 
  345:     ok = bin_tail_e(<<2:2,0:1,1:5>>),
  346:     ok = bin_tail_e(<<2:2,1:1,1:5,42:64>>),
  347:     error = bin_tail_e(<<3:2,1:1,1:5,42:64>>),
  348:     error = bin_tail_e(<<>>),
  349: 
  350:     MD5 = erlang:md5(<<42>>),
  351:     <<"abc">> = bin_tail_f(<<MD5/binary,"abc">>, MD5, 3),
  352:     error = bin_tail_f(<<MD5/binary,"abc">>, MD5, 999),
  353:     {'EXIT',{_,_}} = (catch bin_tail_f(<<0:16/unit:8>>, MD5, 0)),
  354: 
  355:     ok.
  356: 
  357: bin_tail_c(Bin, Offset) ->
  358:     Res = bin_tail_c_dead(Bin, Offset),
  359:     <<_:Offset/binary,_,Tail/binary>> = Bin,
  360:     {Res,Tail} = bin_tail_c_var(Bin, Offset),
  361:     Res.
  362: 
  363: bin_tail_c_dead(Bin, Offset) ->
  364:     <<_:Offset/binary,C,_/binary>> = Bin,
  365:     C.
  366: 
  367: bin_tail_c_var(Bin, Offset) ->
  368:     <<_:Offset/binary,C,Tail/binary>> = Bin,
  369:     {C,Tail}.
  370: 
  371: 
  372: bin_tail_d(Bin, BitOffset) ->
  373:     Res = bin_tail_d_dead(Bin, BitOffset),
  374:     <<_:BitOffset,_:8,Tail/binary>> = Bin,
  375:     {Res,Tail} = bin_tail_d_var(Bin, BitOffset),
  376:     Res.
  377: 
  378: bin_tail_d_dead(Bin, BitOffset) ->
  379:     <<_:BitOffset,C,_/binary>> = Bin,
  380:     C.
  381: 
  382: bin_tail_d_var(Bin, BitOffset) ->
  383:     <<_:BitOffset,C,Tail/binary>> = Bin,
  384:     {C,Tail}.
  385: 
  386: bin_tail_e(Bin) ->
  387:     case bin_tail_e_dead(Bin) of
  388: 	ok ->
  389: 	    <<_,Tail/binary>> = Bin,
  390: 	    Tail = bin_tail_e_var(Bin),
  391: 	    ok;
  392: 	error ->
  393: 	    bin_tail_e_var(Bin)
  394:     end.
  395: 
  396: bin_tail_e_dead(Bin) ->
  397:     case Bin of
  398: 	%% The binary is aligned at the end; neither the bs_skip_bits2 nor
  399: 	%% bs_test_tail2 instructions are needed.
  400: 	<<2:2,_:1,1:5,_/binary>> -> ok;
  401: 	_ -> error
  402:     end.
  403: 
  404: bin_tail_e_var(Bin) ->
  405:     case Bin of
  406: 	%% The binary is aligned at the end; neither the bs_skip_bits2 nor
  407: 	%% bs_test_tail2 instructions are needed.
  408: 	<<2:2,_:1,1:5,Tail/binary>> -> Tail;
  409: 	_ -> error
  410:     end.
  411: 
  412: bin_tail_f(Bin, MD5, Size) ->
  413:     case Bin of
  414:         <<MD5:16/binary, Tail:Size/binary>> ->
  415:             Tail;
  416:         <<MD5:16/binary, _/binary>> ->
  417:             error
  418:     end.
  419: 	    
  420: save_restore(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  421:     0 = save_restore_1(<<0:2,42:6>>),
  422:     {1,3456} = save_restore_1(<<1:2,3456:14>>),
  423:     {2,7981234} = save_restore_1(<<2:2,7981234:30>>),
  424:     {3,763967493838} = save_restore_1(<<0:2,763967493838:62>>),
  425: 
  426:     A = <<" x">>,
  427:     B = <<".x">>,
  428:     C = <<"-x">>,
  429: 
  430:     {" ",<<"x">>} = lll(A),
  431:     {" ",<<"x">>} = mmm(A),
  432:     {" ",<<"x">>} = nnn(A),
  433:     {" ",<<"x">>} = ooo(A),
  434: 
  435:     {".",<<"x">>} = lll(B),
  436:     {".",<<"x">>} = mmm(B),
  437:     {".",<<"x">>} = nnn(B),
  438:     {".",<<"x">>} = ooo(B),
  439: 
  440:     {"-",<<"x">>} = lll(C),
  441:     {"-",<<"x">>} = mmm(C),
  442:     {"-",<<"x">>} = nnn(C),
  443:     {"-",<<"x">>} = ooo(C),
  444: 
  445:     a = multiple_matches(<<777:16>>, <<777:16>>),
  446:     b = multiple_matches(<<777:16>>, <<999:16>>),
  447:     c = multiple_matches(<<777:16>>, <<57:8>>),
  448:     d = multiple_matches(<<17:8>>, <<1111:16>>),
  449: 
  450:     Bin = <<-1:64>>,
  451:     case bad_float_unpack_match(Bin) of
  452: 	-1 -> ok;
  453: 	_Other -> ct:fail(bad_return_value_probably_NaN)
  454:     end.
  455: 
  456: save_restore_1(Bin) ->
  457:     case Bin of
  458: 	<<0:2,_:6>> -> 0;
  459: 	<<1:2,A:14>> -> {1,A};
  460: 	<<2:2,A:30>> -> {2,A};
  461: 	<<A:64>> -> {3,A}
  462:     end.
  463: 
  464: lll(<<Char,         Tail/binary>>) -> {[Char],Tail}.
  465: 
  466: mmm(<<$.,$.,$.,     Tail/binary>>) -> Tail;
  467: mmm(<<$\s,$-,$\s,   Tail/binary>>) -> Tail;
  468: mmm(<<Char,         Tail/binary>>) -> {[Char],Tail}. %% Buggy Tail!
  469: 
  470: nnn(<<"...",        Tail/binary>>) -> Tail;
  471: nnn(<<" - ",        Tail/binary>>) -> Tail;
  472: nnn(<<Char,         Tail/binary>>) -> {[Char],Tail}. %% Buggy Tail!
  473: 
  474: ooo(<<" - ",        Tail/binary>>) -> Tail;
  475: ooo(<<Char,         Tail/binary>>) -> {[Char],Tail}.
  476: 
  477: multiple_matches(<<Y:16>>, <<Y:16>>) -> a;
  478: multiple_matches(<<_:16>>, <<_:16>>) -> b;
  479: multiple_matches(<<_:16>>, <<_:8>>) -> c;
  480: multiple_matches(<<_:8>>, <<_:16>>) -> d.
  481: 
  482: bad_float_unpack_match(<<F:64/float>>) -> F;
  483: bad_float_unpack_match(<<I:64/integer-signed>>) -> I.
  484: 
  485: 
  486: partitioned_bs_match(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  487:     <<1,2,3>> = partitioned_bs_match(blurf, <<42,1,2,3>>),
  488:     error = partitioned_bs_match(10, <<7,8,15,13>>),
  489:     error = partitioned_bs_match(100, {a,tuple,is,'not',a,binary}),
  490:     ok = partitioned_bs_match(0, <<>>),
  491:     fc(partitioned_bs_match, [-1,blurf],
  492: 	     catch partitioned_bs_match(-1, blurf)),
  493:     fc(partitioned_bs_match, [-1,<<1,2,3>>],
  494: 	     catch partitioned_bs_match(-1, <<1,2,3>>)),
  495:     {17,<<1,2,3>>} = partitioned_bs_match_2(1, <<17,1,2,3>>),
  496:     {7,<<1,2,3>>} = partitioned_bs_match_2(7, <<17,1,2,3>>),
  497: 
  498:     fc(partitioned_bs_match_2, [4,<<0:17>>],
  499: 	     catch partitioned_bs_match_2(4, <<0:17>>)),
  500: 
  501:     anything = partitioned_bs_match_3(anything, <<42>>),
  502:     ok = partitioned_bs_match_3(1, 2),
  503: 
  504:     ok.
  505: 
  506: partitioned_bs_match(_, <<42:8,T/binary>>) ->
  507:     T;
  508: partitioned_bs_match(N, _) when N > 0 ->
  509:     error;
  510: partitioned_bs_match(_, <<>>) ->
  511:     ok.
  512: 
  513: partitioned_bs_match_2(1, <<B:8,T/binary>>) ->
  514:     {B,T};
  515: partitioned_bs_match_2(Len, <<_:8,T/binary>>) ->
  516:     {Len,T}.
  517: 
  518: partitioned_bs_match_3(Var, <<_>>) -> Var;
  519: partitioned_bs_match_3(1, 2) -> ok.
  520: 
  521: function_clause(Config) when is_list(Config)  ->
  522:     ok = function_clause_1(<<0,7,0,7,42>>),
  523:     fc(function_clause_1, [<<0,1,2,3>>],
  524:        catch function_clause_1(<<0,1,2,3>>)),
  525:     fc(function_clause_1, [<<0,1,2,3>>],
  526:        catch function_clause_1(<<0,7,0,1,2,3>>)),
  527: 
  528:     ok = function_clause_2(<<0,7,0,7,42>>),
  529:     ok = function_clause_2(<<255>>),
  530:     ok = function_clause_2(<<13:4>>),
  531:     fc(function_clause_2, [<<0,1,2,3>>],
  532:        catch function_clause_2(<<0,1,2,3>>)),
  533:     fc(function_clause_2, [<<0,1,2,3>>],
  534:        catch function_clause_2(<<0,7,0,1,2,3>>)),
  535: 
  536:     ok.
  537: 
  538: function_clause_1(<<0:8,7:8,T/binary>>) ->
  539:     function_clause_1(T);
  540: function_clause_1(<<_:8>>) ->
  541:     ok.
  542: 
  543: function_clause_2(<<0:8,7:8,T/binary>>) ->
  544:     function_clause_2(T);
  545: function_clause_2(<<_:8>>) ->
  546:     ok;
  547: function_clause_2(<<_:4>>) ->
  548:     ok.
  549: 
  550: unit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  551:     42 = peek1(<<42>>),
  552:     43 = peek1(<<43,1,2>>),
  553:     43 = peek1(<<43,1,2,(-1):1>>),
  554:     43 = peek1(<<43,1,2,(-1):2>>),
  555:     43 = peek1(<<43,1,2,(-1):7>>),
  556: 
  557:     99 = peek8(<<99>>),
  558:     100 = peek8(<<100,101>>),
  559:     fc(peek8, [<<100,101,0:1>>], catch peek8(<<100,101,0:1>>)),
  560: 
  561:     37484 = peek16(<<37484:16>>),
  562:     37489 = peek16(<<37489:16,5566:16>>),
  563:     fc(peek16, [<<8>>], catch peek16(<<8>>)),
  564:     fc(peek16, [<<42:15>>], catch peek16(<<42:15>>)),
  565:     fc(peek16, [<<1,2,3,4,5>>], catch peek16(<<1,2,3,4,5>>)),
  566: 
  567:     127 = peek7(<<127:7>>),
  568:     100 = peek7(<<100:7,19:7>>),
  569:     fc(peek7, [<<1,2>>], catch peek7(<<1,2>>)),
  570: 
  571:     1 = unit_opt(1, -1),
  572:     8 = unit_opt(8, -1),
  573: 
  574:     <<1:32,"abc">> = unit_opt_2(<<1:32,"abc">>),
  575:     <<"def">> = unit_opt_2(<<2:32,"def">>),
  576:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch unit_opt_2(<<1:32,33:7>>)),
  577:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch unit_opt_2(<<2:32,55:7>>)),
  578: 
  579:     <<0:64>> = unit_opt_3(<<1:128>>),
  580:     <<1:64>> = unit_opt_3(<<1:64>>),
  581: 
  582:     ok.
  583: 
  584: peek1(<<B:8,_/bitstring>>) -> B.
  585: 
  586: peek7(<<B:7,_/binary-unit:7>>) -> B.
  587: 
  588: peek8(<<B:8,_/binary>>) -> B.
  589: 
  590: peek16(<<B:16,_/binary-unit:16>>) -> B.
  591: 
  592: unit_opt(U, X) ->
  593:     %% Cover type analysis in beam_ssa_type.
  594:     Bin = case U of
  595:               1 -> <<X:7>>;
  596:               8 -> <<X>>
  597:           end,
  598:     %% The type of Bin will be set to {binary,gcd(1, 8)}.
  599:     case Bin of
  600:         <<_/binary-unit:8>> -> 8;
  601:         <<_/binary-unit:1>> -> 1
  602:     end.
  603: 
  604: unit_opt_2(<<St:32,KO/binary>> = Bin0) ->
  605:     Bin = if
  606:               St =:= 1 ->
  607:                   Bin0;
  608:               St =:= 2 ->
  609:                   <<KO/binary>>
  610:           end,
  611:     id(Bin).
  612: 
  613: unit_opt_3(A) when is_binary(A) ->
  614:     %% There should be no test_unit instruction after the first segment, since
  615:     %% we already know A is a binary and its tail will still be a binary after
  616:     %% matching 8 bytes from it.
  617:     <<Bin:8/binary, _/binary>> = A,
  618:     Bin.
  619: 
  620: shared_sub_bins(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  621:     {15,[<<>>,<<5>>,<<4,5>>,<<3,4,5>>,<<2,3,4,5>>]} = sum(<<1,2,3,4,5>>, [], 0),
  622:     ok.
  623: 
  624: sum(<<B,T/binary>>, Acc, Sum) ->
  625:     sum(T, [T|Acc], Sum+B);
  626: sum(<<>>, Last, Sum) -> {Sum,Last}.
  627: 
  628: 
  629: bin_and_float(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  630:     14.0 = bin_and_float(<<1.0/float,2.0/float,3.0/float>>, 0.0),
  631: 
  632:     Sz = id(1),
  633:     <<>> = << <<0>> || <<1:Sz/float-unit:63>> <= <<2:30>> >>,
  634: 
  635:     ok.
  636: 
  637: bin_and_float(<<X/float,Y/float,Z/float,T/binary>>, Sum) when is_float(X),
  638: 							      is_float(Y),
  639: 							      is_float(Z) ->
  640:     bin_and_float(T, Sum+X*X+Y*Y+Z*Z);
  641: bin_and_float(<<>>, Sum) -> Sum.
  642: 
  643: dec_subidentifiers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  644:     {[],<<1,2,3>>} =
  645: 	do_dec_subidentifiers(<<1:1,42:7,1:1,99:7,1,2,3>>, 0, [], 2),
  646:     {[5389],<<1,2,3>>} = do_dec_subidentifiers(<<1:1,42:7,0:1,13:7,1,2,3>>, 0, [], 2),
  647:     {[3,2,1],not_a_binary} = dec_subidentifiers(not_a_binary, any, [1,2,3], 0),
  648:     ok.
  649: 
  650: do_dec_subidentifiers(Buffer, Av, Al, Len) -> 
  651:     Res = dec_subidentifiers(Buffer, Av, Al, Len),
  652:     Res = dec_subidentifiers2(Buffer, Av, Al, Len),
  653:     Res = dec_subidentifiers4(Buffer, Av, Al, Len),
  654:     Res = dec_subidentifiers3(Buffer, Av, Al, Len).
  655: 
  656: dec_subidentifiers(Buffer, _Av, Al, 0) -> 
  657:     {lists:reverse(Al),Buffer}; 
  658: dec_subidentifiers(<<1:1,H:7,T/binary>>, Av, Al, Len) -> 
  659:     dec_subidentifiers(T, (Av bsl 7) bor H, Al, Len-1);
  660: dec_subidentifiers(<<H,T/binary>>, Av, Al, Len) -> 
  661:     dec_subidentifiers(T, 0, [((Av bsl 7) bor H)|Al], Len-1).
  662: 
  663: dec_subidentifiers2(<<Buffer/binary>>, _Av, Al, 0) ->
  664:     {lists:reverse(Al),Buffer}; 
  665: dec_subidentifiers2(<<1:1,H:7,T/binary>>, Av, Al, Len) -> 
  666:     dec_subidentifiers2(T, (Av bsl 7) bor H, Al, Len-1); 
  667: dec_subidentifiers2(<<H,T/binary>>, Av, Al, Len) -> 
  668:     dec_subidentifiers2(T, 0, [((Av bsl 7) bor H)|Al], Len-1).
  669: 
  670: dec_subidentifiers3(Buffer, _Av, Al, 0) when is_binary(Buffer) ->
  671:     {lists:reverse(Al),Buffer}; 
  672: dec_subidentifiers3(<<1:1,H:7,T/binary>>, Av, Al, Len) -> 
  673:     dec_subidentifiers3(T, (Av bsl 7) bor H, Al, Len-1); 
  674: dec_subidentifiers3(<<H,T/binary>>, Av, Al, Len) -> 
  675:     dec_subidentifiers3(T, 0, [((Av bsl 7) bor H)|Al], Len-1).
  676: 
  677: dec_subidentifiers4(<<1:1,H:7,T/binary>>, Av, Al, Len) when Len =/= 0 -> 
  678:     dec_subidentifiers4(T, (Av bsl 7) bor H, Al, Len-1); 
  679: dec_subidentifiers4(<<H,T/binary>>, Av, Al, Len) when Len =/= 0 -> 
  680:     dec_subidentifiers4(T, 0, [((Av bsl 7) bor H)|Al], Len-1);
  681: dec_subidentifiers4(Buffer, _Av, Al, 0) -> 
  682:     {lists:reverse(Al),Buffer}.
  683: 
  684: 
  685: skip_optional_tag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  686:     {ok,<<>>} = skip_optional_tag(<<42>>, <<42>>),
  687:     {ok,<<>>} = skip_optional_tag(<<42,1>>, <<42,1>>),
  688:     {ok,<<1,2,3>>} = skip_optional_tag(<<42>>, <<42,1,2,3>>),
  689:     missing = skip_optional_tag(<<2:3>>, blurf),
  690:     ok.
  691: 
  692: skip_optional_tag(<<>>, Binary) ->
  693:     {ok,Binary};
  694: skip_optional_tag(<<Tag,RestTag/binary>>, <<Tag,Rest/binary>>) ->
  695:     skip_optional_tag(RestTag, Rest);
  696: skip_optional_tag(_, _) -> missing.
  697: 
  698: decode_integer(_Config) ->
  699:     {10795,<<43>>,whatever} = decode_integer(1, <<42,43>>, whatever),
  700:     {-28909,<<19>>,whatever} = decode_integer(1, <<143,19>>, whatever),
  701:     ok.
  702: 
  703: decode_integer(Len, <<B1:1,B2:7,Bs/binary>>, RemovedBytes) when B1 == 0 ->
  704:     Bin = <<_Skip:Len/unit:8, Buffer2/binary>> = <<B1:1,B2:7,Bs/binary>>,
  705:     Size = byte_size(Bin),
  706:     <<Int:Size/unit:8>> = Bin,
  707:     {Int,Buffer2,RemovedBytes};
  708: decode_integer(Len, <<B1:1,B2:7,Bs/binary>>, RemovedBytes)  ->
  709:     Bin = <<_Skip:Len/unit:8,Buffer2/binary>> = <<B1:1,B2:7,Bs/binary>>,
  710:     Size = byte_size(Bin),
  711:     <<N:Size/unit:8>> = <<B2,Bs/binary>>,
  712:     Int = N - (1 bsl (8 * size(Bin) -1)),
  713:     {Int,Buffer2,RemovedBytes}.
  714: 
  715: -define(DATELEN, 16).
  716: 
  717: wfbm(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  718:     %% check_for_dot_or_space and get_tail is from wfbm4 by Steve Vinoski,
  719:     %% with modifications.
  720:     {nomatch,0} = check_for_dot_or_space(<<" ">>),
  721:     {nomatch,0} = check_for_dot_or_space(<<" abc">>),
  722:     {ok,<<"abcde">>} = check_for_dot_or_space(<<"abcde 34555">>),
  723:     {nomatch,0} = check_for_dot_or_space(<<".gurka">>),
  724:     {nomatch,1} = check_for_dot_or_space(<<"g.urka">>),
  725: 
  726:     nomatch = get_tail(<<>>),
  727:     {ok,<<"2007/10/23/blurf">>} = get_tail(<<"200x/2007/10/23/blurf ">>),
  728:     {skip,?DATELEN+5} = get_tail(<<"200x/2007/10/23/blurf.">>),
  729:     nomatch = get_tail(<<"200y.2007.10.23.blurf ">>),
  730:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch get_tail({no,binary,at,all})),
  731:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch get_tail(no_binary)),
  732:     ok.
  733: 
  734: check_for_dot_or_space(Bin) ->
  735:     check_for_dot_or_space(Bin, 0).
  736: 
  737: check_for_dot_or_space(<<$\s, _/binary>>, 0) ->
  738:     {nomatch,0};
  739: check_for_dot_or_space(Bin, Len) ->
  740:     case Bin of
  741:         <<Front:Len/binary, $\s, _/binary>> ->
  742:             {ok,Front};
  743:         <<_:Len/binary, $., _/binary>> ->
  744:             {nomatch,Len};
  745: 	_ ->
  746:             check_for_dot_or_space(Bin, Len+1)
  747:     end.
  748: 
  749: get_tail(<<>>) ->
  750:     nomatch;
  751: get_tail(Bin) ->
  752:     <<Front:?DATELEN/binary, Tail/binary>> = Bin,
  753:     case Front of
  754:         <<_:3/binary,"x/",Y:4/binary,$/,M:2/binary,$/,D:2/binary,$/>> ->
  755: 	    case check_for_dot_or_space(Tail) of
  756:                 {ok,Match} ->
  757:                     {ok,<<Y/binary,$/,M/binary,$/,D/binary,$/, Match/binary>>};
  758:                 {nomatch,Skip} -> {skip,?DATELEN + Skip}
  759:             end;
  760:         _ -> nomatch
  761:     end.
  762: 
  763: degenerated_match(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  764:     error = degenerated_match_1(<<>>),
  765:     1 = degenerated_match_1(<<1:1>>),
  766:     2 = degenerated_match_1(<<42,43>>),
  767: 
  768:     error = degenerated_match_2(<<>>),
  769:     no_split = degenerated_match_2(<<1,2>>),
  770:     {<<1,2,3,4>>,<<5>>} = degenerated_match_2(<<1,2,3,4,5>>),
  771:     
  772:     ok.
  773: 
  774: degenerated_match_1(<<>>) -> error;
  775: degenerated_match_1(Bin) -> byte_size(Bin).
  776: 
  777: degenerated_match_2(<<>>) -> error;
  778: degenerated_match_2(Bin) ->
  779:     case byte_size(Bin) > 4 of
  780: 	true ->
  781: 	    split_binary(Bin, 4);
  782: 	false ->
  783: 	    no_split
  784:     end.
  785: 
  786: bs_sum(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  787:     0 = bs_sum_1([]),
  788:     0 = bs_sum_1(<<>>),
  789:     42 = bs_sum_1([42]),
  790:     1 = bs_sum_1(<<1>>),
  791:     10 = bs_sum_1([1,2,3,4]),
  792:     15 = bs_sum_1(<<1,2,3,4,5>>),
  793:     21 = bs_sum_1([1,2,3|<<4,5,6>>]),
  794:     15 = bs_sum_1([1,2,3|{4,5}]),
  795:     6 = bs_sum_1([1,2,3|zero]),
  796:     6 = bs_sum_1([1,2,3|0]),
  797:     7 = bs_sum_1([1,2,3|one]),
  798: 
  799:     fc(catch bs_sum_1({too,big,tuple})),
  800:     fc(catch bs_sum_1([1,2,3|{too,big,tuple}])),
  801: 
  802:     [] = sneaky_alias(<<>>),
  803:     [559,387655] = sneaky_alias(id(<<559:32,387655:32>>)),
  804:     fc(sneaky_alias, [<<1>>], catch sneaky_alias(id(<<1>>))),
  805:     fc(sneaky_alias, [[1,2,3,4]], catch sneaky_alias(lists:seq(1, 4))),
  806:     ok.
  807: 
  808: bs_sum_1(<<H,T/binary>>) -> H+bs_sum_1(T);
  809: bs_sum_1([H|T]) -> H+bs_sum_1(T);
  810: bs_sum_1({A,B}=_Tuple=_AliasForNoGoodReason) -> A+B;
  811: bs_sum_1(0) -> 0;
  812: bs_sum_1(zero=_Zero) -> 0;
  813: bs_sum_1(one) -> 1;
  814: bs_sum_1([]) -> 0;
  815: bs_sum_1(<<>>) -> 0.
  816: 
  817: sneaky_alias(<<>>=L) -> binary_to_list(L);
  818: sneaky_alias(<<From:32,L/binary>>) -> [From|sneaky_alias(L)].
  819: 
  820: coverage(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  821:     0 = coverage_fold(fun(B, A) -> A+B end, 0, <<>>),
  822:     6 = coverage_fold(fun(B, A) -> A+B end, 0, <<1,2,3>>),
  823:     fc(catch coverage_fold(fun(B, A) ->
  824: 					 A+B
  825: 				 end, 0, [a,b,c])),
  826: 
  827:     {<<42.0:64/float>>,float} = coverage_build(<<>>, <<42>>, float),
  828:     {<<>>,not_a_tuple} = coverage_build(<<>>, <<>>, not_a_tuple),
  829:     {<<16#76,"abc",16#A9,"abc">>,{x,42,43}} =
  830: 	coverage_build(<<>>, <<16#7,16#A>>, {x,y,z}),
  831: 
  832:     [<<2>>,<<1>>] = coverage_bc(<<1,2>>, []),
  833: 
  834:     {x,<<"abc">>,z} = coverage_setelement(<<2,"abc">>, {x,y,z}),
  835: 
  836:     [42] = coverage_apply(<<42>>, [coverage_id]),
  837:     42 = coverage_external(<<42>>),
  838: 
  839:     do_coverage_bin_to_term_list([]),
  840:     do_coverage_bin_to_term_list([lists:seq(0, 10),{a,b,c},<<23:42>>]),
  841:     fc(coverage_bin_to_term_list, [<<0,0,0,7>>],
  842: 	     catch do_coverage_bin_to_term_list_1(<<7:32>>)),
  843: 
  844:     <<>> = coverage_per_key(<<4:32>>),
  845:     <<$a,$b,$c>> = coverage_per_key(<<7:32,"abc">>),
  846: 
  847:     binary = coverage_bitstring(<<>>),
  848:     binary = coverage_bitstring(<<7>>),
  849:     bitstring = coverage_bitstring(<<7:4>>),
  850:     other = coverage_bitstring([a]),
  851: 
  852:     %% Cover code in beam_trim.
  853: 
  854:     {done,<<17,53>>,[253,155,200]} =
  855:         coverage_trim(<<253,155,200,17,53>>, e0, e1, e2, e3, []),
  856: 
  857:     <<"(right|linux)">> = coverage_trim_1(<<"">>, <<"right">>, <<"linux">>),
  858:     <<"/(right|linux)">> = coverage_trim_1(<<"/">>, <<"right">>, <<"linux">>),
  859:     <<"(left|linux)/(right|linux)">> =
  860:         coverage_trim_1(<<"left">>, <<"right">>, <<"linux">>),
  861: 
  862:     {10,<<"-">>,""} = coverage_trim_2(<<"-">>, 10, []),
  863:     {8,<<"-">>,"aa"} = coverage_trim_2(<<"aa-">>, 10, []),
  864: 
  865:     {<<"abc">>,<<"tag">>} = coverage_trim_3([<<"abc","tag">>], 3),
  866: 
  867:     <<57348:16/native>> = coverage_trim_4(<<"abc">>),
  868: 
  869:     %% Cover code in beam_ssa_codegen.
  870:     ok = coverage_beam_ssa_codegen(<<2>>),
  871: 
  872:     %% Cover code in beam_ssa_pre_codegen.
  873:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = catch coverage_beam_ssa_pre_codegen(<<>>),
  874: 
  875:     %% Cover code in beam_ssa_bsm.
  876:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,<<>>},_}} = catch coverage_beam_ssa_bsm_error(id(<<>>)),
  877: 
  878:     %% Cover code for merging registers in beam_validator.
  879:     42 = coverage_beam_validator(id(fun() -> 42 end)),
  880:     ok = coverage_beam_validator(id(fun() -> throw(whatever) end)),
  881: 
  882:     ok.
  883: 
  884: coverage_fold(Fun, Acc, <<H,T/binary>>) ->
  885:     IdFun = fun id/1,
  886:     coverage_fold(Fun, Fun(IdFun(H), IdFun(Acc)), T);
  887: coverage_fold(Fun, Acc, <<>>) when is_function(Fun, 2) -> Acc.
  888: 
  889: coverage_build(Acc0, <<H,T/binary>>, float) ->
  890:     Float = id(<<H:64/float>>),
  891:     Acc = <<Acc0/binary,Float/binary>>,
  892:     coverage_build(Acc, T, float);
  893: coverage_build(Acc0, <<H,T/binary>>, Tuple0) ->
  894:     Str = id(<<H:(id(4)),(H-1):4,"abc">>),
  895:     Acc = id(<<Acc0/bitstring,Str/bitstring>>),
  896:     Tuple = setelement(2, setelement(3, Tuple0, 43), 42),
  897:     if
  898: 	byte_size(Acc) > 0 ->
  899: 	    coverage_build(Acc, T, Tuple)
  900:     end;
  901: coverage_build(Acc, <<>>, Tuple) -> {Acc,Tuple}.
  902: 
  903: coverage_bc(<<H,T/binary>>, Acc) ->
  904:     B = << <<C:8>> || C <- [H] >>,
  905:     coverage_bc(T, [B|Acc]);
  906: coverage_bc(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
  907: 
  908: coverage_setelement(<<H,T1/binary>>, Tuple) when element(1, Tuple) =:= x ->
  909:     setelement(H, Tuple, T1).
  910: 
  911: coverage_apply(<<H,T/binary>>, [F|Fs]) ->
  912:     [?MODULE:F(H)|coverage_apply(T, Fs)];
  913: coverage_apply(<<>>, []) -> [].
  914: 
  915: coverage_external(<<H,T/binary>>) ->
  916:     ?MODULE:coverage_external_ignore(T, T),
  917:     H.
  918: 
  919: coverage_external_ignore(_, _) ->
  920:     ok.
  921: 
  922: coverage_id(I) -> id(I).
  923: 
  924: do_coverage_bin_to_term_list(L) ->
  925:     Bin = << <<(begin BinTerm = term_to_binary(Term),
  926: 		      <<(byte_size(BinTerm)):32,BinTerm/binary>> end)/binary>> ||
  927: 	      Term <- L >>,
  928:     L = do_coverage_bin_to_term_list_1(Bin),
  929:     L = do_coverage_bin_to_term_list_1(<<Bin/binary,7:32,"garbage">>),
  930:     L = do_coverage_bin_to_term_list_1(<<7:32,"garbage",Bin/binary>>).   
  931: 
  932: do_coverage_bin_to_term_list_1(Bin) ->
  933:     Res = coverage_bin_to_term_list(Bin),
  934:     Res = coverage_bin_to_term_list(Bin, []),
  935:     Res = coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(Bin),
  936:     Res = coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(Bin, []).
  937: 
  938: coverage_bin_to_term_list(<<Sz:32,BinTerm:Sz/binary,T/binary>>) ->
  939:     try binary_to_term(BinTerm) of
  940: 	Term -> [Term|coverage_bin_to_term_list(T)]
  941:     catch
  942: 	error:badarg -> coverage_bin_to_term_list(T)
  943:     end;
  944: coverage_bin_to_term_list(<<>>) -> [].
  945: 
  946: coverage_bin_to_term_list(<<Sz:32,BinTerm:Sz/binary,T/binary>>, Acc) ->
  947:     try binary_to_term(BinTerm) of
  948: 	Term -> coverage_bin_to_term_list(T, [Term|Acc])
  949:     catch
  950: 	error:badarg -> coverage_bin_to_term_list(T, Acc)
  951:     end;
  952: coverage_bin_to_term_list(<<>>, Acc) -> lists:reverse(Acc).
  953: 
  954: coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(<<Sz:32,BinTerm:Sz/binary,T/binary>>) ->
  955:     case catch binary_to_term(BinTerm) of
  956: 	{'EXIT',_} -> coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(T);
  957: 	Term -> [Term|coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(T)]
  958:     end;
  959: coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(<<>>) -> [].
  960: 
  961: coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(<<Sz:32,BinTerm:Sz/binary,T/binary>>, Acc) ->
  962:     case catch binary_to_term(BinTerm) of
  963: 	{'EXIT',_} -> coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(T, Acc);
  964: 	Term -> coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(T, [Term|Acc])
  965:     end;
  966: coverage_bin_to_term_list_catch(<<>>, Acc) -> lists:reverse(Acc).
  967: 
  968: coverage_per_key(<<BinSize:32,Bin/binary>> = B) ->
  969:     true = (byte_size(B) =:= BinSize),
  970:     Bin.
  971: 
  972: coverage_bitstring(Bin) when is_binary(Bin) -> binary;
  973: coverage_bitstring(<<_/bitstring>>) -> bitstring;
  974: coverage_bitstring(_) -> other.
  975: 
  976: coverage_trim(<<C:8,T/binary>> = Bin, E0, E1, E2, E3, Acc) ->
  977:     case id(C > 128) of
  978:         true ->
  979:             coverage_trim(T, E0, E1, E2, E3, [C|Acc]);
  980:         false ->
  981:             {done,Bin,lists:reverse(Acc)}
  982:     end.
  983: 
  984: coverage_trim_1(<<>>, Right, OsType) ->
  985:     do_coverage_trim_1(Right, OsType);
  986: coverage_trim_1(<<"/">>, Right, OsType) ->
  987:     <<"/",(do_coverage_trim_1(Right, OsType))/binary>>;
  988: coverage_trim_1(Left, Right, OsType) ->
  989:     <<(do_coverage_trim_1(Left, OsType))/binary,
  990:       "/",
  991:       (do_coverage_trim_1(Right, OsType))/binary>>.
  992: 
  993: do_coverage_trim_1(A, OsType) ->
  994:     <<"(",A/binary,"|",OsType/binary,")">>.
  995: 
  996: coverage_trim_2(<<C/utf8,R/binary>> = Bin, I, L) ->
  997:     case printable_char(C) of
  998:         true ->
  999:             coverage_trim_2(R, I - 1, [C | L]);
 1000:         false ->
 1001:             {I,Bin,lists:reverse(L)}
 1002:     end.
 1003: 
 1004: coverage_trim_3(CipherTextFragment, TagLen) ->
 1005:     CipherLen = iolist_size(CipherTextFragment) - TagLen,
 1006:     <<CipherText:CipherLen/bytes, CipherTag:TagLen/bytes>> =
 1007:         iolist_to_binary(CipherTextFragment),
 1008:     {CipherText, CipherTag}.
 1009: 
 1010: coverage_trim_4(Bin) ->
 1011:     << <<X:16>> || <<X:8>> <= Bin >>,
 1012:     try
 1013:         <<57348:16/native>>
 1014:     catch
 1015:         _:_ ->
 1016:             error
 1017:     end.
 1018: 
 1019: printable_char($a) -> true;
 1020: printable_char(_) -> false.
 1021: 
 1022: coverage_beam_ssa_codegen(Bin) ->
 1023:     %% With +r21 there will be a copy instruction that copies
 1024:     %% a map literal to an x register, thus covering a line
 1025:     %% beam_ssa_codegen:opt_allocate_defs/2.
 1026:     case #{1 => 42} of
 1027:         #{1 := 42} ->
 1028:             << <<0>> || <<2>> <= Bin >>
 1029:     end,
 1030:     ok.
 1031: 
 1032: coverage_beam_ssa_pre_codegen(<<V0:0, V1:(V0 div V0), _:(V0 bsl V1)/bits>>) ->
 1033:     ok.
 1034: 
 1035: coverage_beam_ssa_bsm_error(<<B/bitstring>>) ->
 1036:     B andalso ok.
 1037: 
 1038: coverage_beam_validator(F) ->
 1039:     coverage_beam_validator(ok, ok, ok,
 1040:        try
 1041:            F()
 1042:        catch
 1043:            <<V:ok/binary>> ->
 1044:                V;
 1045:            _ ->
 1046:                ok
 1047:        end).
 1048: 
 1049: coverage_beam_validator(_, _, _, Result) -> Result.
 1050: 
 1051: multiple_uses(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1052:     {344,62879,345,<<245,159,1,89>>} = multiple_uses_1(<<1,88,245,159,1,89>>),
 1053:     true = multiple_uses_2(<<0,0,197,18>>),
 1054:     <<42,43>> = multiple_uses_3(<<0,0,42,43>>, fun id/1),
 1055: 
 1056:     ok = first_after(<<>>, 42),
 1057:     <<1>> = first_after(<<1,2,3>>, 0),
 1058:     <<2>> = first_after(<<1,2,3>>, 1),
 1059: 
 1060:     ok.
 1061: 
 1062: multiple_uses_1(<<X:16,Tail/binary>>) ->
 1063:     %% NOT OPTIMIZED: sub binary is matched or used in more than one place
 1064:     {Y,Z} = multiple_uses_match(Tail),
 1065:     {X,Y,Z,Tail}.
 1066: 
 1067: multiple_uses_2(<<_:16,Tail/binary>>) ->
 1068:     %% NOT OPTIMIZED: sub binary is matched or used in more than one place
 1069:     multiple_uses_cmp(Tail, Tail).
 1070: 
 1071: multiple_uses_3(<<_:16,Tail/binary>>, Fun) ->
 1072:     %% NOT OPTIMIZED: sub binary is used or returned
 1073:     Fun(Tail).
 1074: 
 1075: multiple_uses_match(<<Y:16,Z:16>>) ->
 1076:     {Y,Z}.
 1077: 
 1078: multiple_uses_cmp(<<Y:16>>, <<Y:16>>) -> true;
 1079: multiple_uses_cmp(<<_:16>>, <<_:16>>) -> false.
 1080: 
 1081: first_after(Data, Offset) ->
 1082:     case byte_size(Data) > Offset of
 1083: 	false ->
 1084: 	    {_First, _Rest} = {ok, ok},
 1085: 	    ok;
 1086: 	true ->
 1087: 	    <<_:Offset/binary, Rest/binary>> = Data,
 1088: 	    %% 'Rest' saved in y(0) before the call.
 1089:             {First, _} = match_first(Data, Rest),
 1090:             %% When beam_bsm sees the code, the following line
 1091:             %% which uses y(0) has been optimized away.
 1092: 	    {First, Rest} = {First, Rest},
 1093: 	    First
 1094:     end.
 1095: 
 1096: match_first(_, <<First:1/binary, Rest/binary>>) ->
 1097:     {First, Rest}.
 1098: 
 1099: zero_label(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1100:     <<"nosemouth">> = read_pols(<<"FACE","nose","mouth">>),
 1101:     <<"CE">> = read_pols(<<"noFACE">>),
 1102:     ok.
 1103: 
 1104: read_pols(Data) ->
 1105:     <<PolygonType:4/binary,Rest/binary>> = Data,
 1106:     %% Intentional warning.
 1107:     (PolygonType == <<"FACE">>) or (PolygonType == <<"PTCH">>),
 1108:     Rest.
 1109: 
 1110: followed_by_catch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1111:     ok = handle(<<0,1,2,3,4,5>>).
 1112: 
 1113: -record(rec,{field}).
 1114: handle(<<>>) ->  ok;
 1115: handle(Msg) ->
 1116:     <<_DataLen:16, Rest/binary>> = Msg,
 1117:     case catch fooX:func() of
 1118: 	[X] ->
 1119: 	    X#rec.field;
 1120: 	_ ->
 1121: 	    ok
 1122:     end,
 1123:     handle(Rest).
 1124: 
 1125: matching_meets_construction(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1126:     Bin = id(<<"abc">>),
 1127:     Len = id(2),
 1128:     Tail0 = id(<<1,2,3,4,5>>),
 1129:     <<_:Len/binary,Tail/binary>> = Tail0,
 1130:     Res = <<Tail/binary,Bin/binary>>,
 1131:     <<3,4,5,"abc">> = Res,
 1132:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch matching_meets_construction_1(<<"Abc">>)),
 1133:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch matching_meets_construction_2(<<"Abc">>)),
 1134:     <<"Bbc">> = matching_meets_construction_3(<<"Abc">>),
 1135: 
 1136:     <<1,2>> = encode_octet_string(<<1,2,3>>, 2),
 1137:     ok.
 1138: 
 1139: matching_meets_construction_1(<<"A",H/binary>>) -> <<"B",H>>.
 1140: 
 1141: matching_meets_construction_2(<<"A",H/binary>>) -> <<"B",H/float>>.
 1142: 
 1143: matching_meets_construction_3(<<"A",H/binary>>) -> <<"B",H/binary>>.
 1144: 
 1145: encode_octet_string(<<OctetString/binary>>, Len) ->
 1146:     <<OctetString:Len/binary-unit:8>>.
 1147: 
 1148: simon(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1149:     one = simon(blurf, <<>>),
 1150:     two = simon(0, <<42>>),
 1151:     fc(simon, [17,<<1>>], catch simon(17, <<1>>)),
 1152:     fc(simon, [0,<<1,2,3>>], catch simon(0, <<1,2,3>>)),
 1153: 
 1154:     one = simon2(blurf, <<9>>),
 1155:     two = simon2(0, <<9,1>>),
 1156:     fc(simon2, [0,<<9,10,11>>], catch simon2(0, <<9,10,11>>)),
 1157:     ok.
 1158: 
 1159: simon(_, <<>>) -> one;
 1160: simon(0, <<_>>) -> two.
 1161: 
 1162: simon2(_, <<9>>) -> one;
 1163: simon2(0, <<_:16>>) -> two.

 1168:     ok = matching_and_andalso_1(<<1,2,3>>, 3),
 1169:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch matching_and_andalso_1(<<1,2,3>>, -8)),
 1170:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch matching_and_andalso_1(<<1,2,3>>, blurf)),
 1171:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch matching_and_andalso_1(<<1,2,3>>, 19)),
 1172: 
 1173:     {"abc",<<"xyz">>} = matching_and_andalso_23("abc", <<"-xyz">>),
 1174:     {"abc",<<"">>} = matching_and_andalso_23("abc", <<($a-1)>>),
 1175:     {"abc",<<"">>} = matching_and_andalso_23("abc", <<($z+1)>>),
 1176:     {"abc",<<"">>} = matching_and_andalso_23("abc", <<($A-1)>>),
 1177:     {"abc",<<"">>} = matching_and_andalso_23("abc", <<($Z+1)>>),
 1178:     error = matching_and_andalso_23([], <<>>),
 1179:     error = matching_and_andalso_23([], <<$A>>),
 1180:     error = matching_and_andalso_23([], <<$Z>>),
 1181:     error = matching_and_andalso_23([], <<$a>>),
 1182:     error = matching_and_andalso_23([], <<$z>>),
 1183:     ok.
 1184: 
 1185: matching_and_andalso_1(<<Bitmap/binary>>, K)
 1186:   when is_integer(K) andalso size(Bitmap) >= K andalso 0 < K ->
 1187:     ok.
 1188: 
 1189: matching_and_andalso_23(Datetime, Bin) ->
 1190:     Res = matching_and_andalso_2(Datetime, Bin),
 1191:     Res = matching_and_andalso_3(Datetime, Bin),
 1192:     Res.
 1193:

 1195:   when not ((H >= $a) andalso (H =< $z)) andalso
 1196:        not ((H >= $A) andalso (H =< $Z)) ->
 1197:     {Datetime,T};
 1198: matching_and_andalso_2(_, _) -> error.

 1203:   when not ((abs(H) >= $a) andalso (abs(H) =< $z)) andalso
 1204:        not ((abs(H) >= $A) andalso (abs(H) =< $Z)) ->
 1205:     {Datetime,T};

 1222: parse_v1_or_v11_tag(<<"TAG", Title:30/binary,
 1223: 		     Artist:30/binary, Album:30/binary,
 1224: 		     _Year:4/binary, _Comment:28/binary,
 1225: 		     0:8, Track:8, _Genre:8>>) ->
 1226:     {ok,
 1227:      {"ID3v1.1",
 1228:       [{track, Track}, {title, trim(Title)},
 1229:        {artist, trim(Artist)}, {album, trim(Album)}]}};

 1231: 		     Artist:30/binary, Album:30/binary,

 1233: 		     _Genre:8>>) ->
 1234:     {ok,

 1241: 
 1242: trim(Bin) ->
 1243:     list_to_binary(trim_blanks(binary_to_list(Bin))).
 1244: 
 1245: trim_blanks(L) ->
 1246:     lists:reverse(skip_blanks_and_zero(lists:reverse(L))).
 1247: 
 1248: skip_blanks_and_zero([$\s|T]) ->
 1249:     skip_blanks_and_zero(T);
 1250: skip_blanks_and_zero([0|T]) ->
 1251:     skip_blanks_and_zero(T);
 1252: skip_blanks_and_zero(L) ->
 1253:     L.
 1254: 
 1255: %% OTP-7233. Record and binary matching optimizations clashed.
 1256: %% Thanks to Vladimir Klebansky.
 1257: 
 1258: -record(rec_otp_7233, {key, val}).
 1259: 
 1260: otp_7233(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1261:     otp_7233_1(#rec_otp_7233{key = <<"XXabcde">>,val=[{"xxxxxxxx",42}]}),
 1262:     [<<"XXabcde">>,{"xxxxxxxx",42}] = get(io_format),
 1263:     erase(io_format),
 1264:     otp_7233_1(#rec_otp_7233{key = <<"XXabcde">>,val=[]}),
 1265:     undefined = get(io_format),
 1266:     ok.
 1267: 
 1268: otp_7233_1(Rec) ->
 1269:     <<K:2/binary,_Rest:5/binary>> = Rec#rec_otp_7233.key,
 1270:     case K of
 1271: 	<<"XX">> ->
 1272: 	    Value = Rec#rec_otp_7233.val,
 1273: 	    case lists:keyfind("xxxxxxxx", 1, Value) of
 1274: 		false ->
 1275: 		    ok;
 1276: 		T ->
 1277: 		    put(io_format, [Rec#rec_otp_7233.key,T])
 1278: 	    end;
 1279: 	_ -> ok
 1280:     end.

 1283: otp_7240(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1284:     a = otp_7240_a(0, <<>>),
 1285:     b = otp_7240_a(1, 2),
 1286: 
 1287:     a = otp_7240_b(anything, <<>>),
 1288:     b = otp_7240_b(1, {x,y}),
 1289: 
 1290:     a = otp_7240_c(anything, <<>>),
 1291:     b = otp_7240_c(1, <<2>>),
 1292: 
 1293:     a = otp_7240_d(anything, <<>>),
 1294:     b = otp_7240_d(again, <<2>>),
 1295: 
 1296:     a = otp_7240_e(anything, <<>>),
 1297:     b = otp_7240_e(1, 41),
 1298: 
 1299:     a = otp_7240_f(anything, <<>>),
 1300:     b = otp_7240_f(1, {}),
 1301:     
 1302:     ok.
 1303:

 1305: otp_7240_a(1, 2) -> b.

 1313: otp_7240_d(_, <<>>) -> a;
 1314: otp_7240_d(_, <<2>>) -> b.

 1348: otp_7498_bar(Bin, _I)  ->
